Submodules#

mediator.common.registry.base module#

exception mediator.common.registry.base.CollisionHandlerStoreError[source]#

Bases: KeyError, HandlerStoreError

Collision handler store error.

Raised when given handler store implementation has handler entry indexation (i.e. using handler key) and internal constraints rejects trial of storing given key duplicate.

handler_pipeline()[source]#

Builds pipeline for given handler including all call modifiers. :return: pipeline callable compatible with handler interface

Return type

Callable[[ActionSubject], Awaitable[ActionResult]]

property key: Hashable#

Provides unique key that will be used to match given handler with action. :return: hashable key

modifiers: Sequence[ModifierFactory] = ()#
pipeline(call)[source]#

Builds pipeline for given action callable including all call modifiers. :param call: action callable to be wrapped by modifiers :return: pipeline callable compatible with handler interface

Return type

Callable[[ActionSubject], Awaitable[ActionResult]]

stack(modifiers)[source]#

Produces new handler entry with added new modifier factories on top. :param modifiers: modifiers to add on top/in front of given entry ones :return: new handler entry with extender modifier stack

class mediator.common.registry.base.HandlerStore[source]#

Bases: object

Handler store abstraction.

Handler stores are used for storing handler entries.

Adds given handler entry into store. :param entry: handler entry to add into store

Parameters

entry (HandlerEntry) –

include(entries)[source]#

Adds all handler entries from given iterable into store. :param entries: handler entries iterator

Parameters

entries (Iterable[HandlerEntry]) –

exception mediator.common.registry.base.HandlerStoreError[source]#

Bases: Exception

Base handler store error.

exception mediator.common.registry.base.InspectionHandlerStoreError[source]#

Bases: HandlerStoreError

Inspection handler store error.

Raised when given handler store implementation performs object inspection (i.e. using handler factory).

exception mediator.common.registry.base.LookupHandlerStoreError[source]#

Bases: LookupError, HandlerStoreError

Lookup handler store error.

Raised when given handler store implementation has lookup mechanisms (i.e. using handler key) and fails to find given entry by key.

mediator.common.registry.registry module#

class mediator.common.registry.registry.HandlerRegistry[source]#

Bases: HandlerStore

Handler registry class.

Facade that joins modified handler store functionality with ability to add handlers directly created from raw objects.

__init__(store, policies=None, cascade=None, modifiers=())[source]#

Initializes handler registry. :param store: underlying handler store used for handler entry storage :param policies: (optional) sequence of policies to be used as recipe to convert raw objects into handlers; if not provided cascade argument should be set; is overwritten when cascade is provided :param cascade: (optional) custom handler factory cascade to customize policy into handler factory mapping; if not provided policies argument should be set :param modifiers: sequence of modifiers to be applied on new handler entries

Parameters

  • store (HandlerStore) –

  • policies (Optional[Sequence[Union[CallableHandlerPolicy, MethodHandlerPolicy, MappablePolicy]]]) –

  • cascade (Optional[HandlerFactoryCascade]) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

add(entry)[source]#

Adds given handler entry into store. :param entry: handler entry to add into store

Parameters

entry (HandlerEntry) –

include(entries)[source]#

Adds all handler entries from given iterable into store. :param entries: handler entries iterator

Parameters

entries (Iterable[HandlerEntry]) –

register(obj=None, *, policies=None, modifiers=())[source]#

Registers given raw object as an action handler or provides decorator that registers given raw object as an action handler. :param obj: (optional) raw handler object (like function) :param policies: custom one time polices to be used in object inspection process :param modifiers: custom one time modifiers to be applied on given object handler :return: returns given raw object or decorator, when no object is provided

Parameters

  • obj (Optional[Any]) –

  • policies (Optional[Sequence[Union[CallableHandlerPolicy, MethodHandlerPolicy, MappablePolicy]]]) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

class mediator.common.registry.stores.CollectionHandlerStore[source]#

Bases: HandlerStore

Collection handler store.

Ordinary handler store that holds handler entries in collection without any constraints.

class mediator.common.registry.stores.MappingHandlerStore[source]#

Bases: HandlerStore

Mapping handler store.

Handler store that stores entries in mapping and preserves uniqueness of stored entries by its keys.

__init__()[source]#

Initializes mapping handler store

add(entry)[source]#

Adds given handler entry into store. :param entry: handler entry to add into store :raises CollisionHandlerStoreError: when handler entry with given key already exists in this store

Parameters

entry (HandlerEntry) –

get(key)[source]#

Returns handler entry with matching key. :param key: key to find matching handler entry :raises LookupHandlerStoreError: when there is no handler entry with given key :return: handler entry with matching key

Parameters

key (Hashable) –

Return type

HandlerEntry

include(entries)[source]#

Adds all handler entries from given iterable into store. :param entries: handler entries iterator :raises CollisionHandlerStoreError: when handler entry with given key already exists in this store

Parameters

entries (Iterable[HandlerEntry]) –

class mediator.common.registry.stores.ModifierHandlerStore[source]#

Bases: HandlerStore

Modifier handler store.

Handler store that for every new entry adds its modifiers stack and adds modified entries into underlying handler store.

__init__(nested, modifiers)[source]#

Initializes modifier handler store. :param nested: handler store used for modified entries storage :param modifiers: modifiers to be applied on every new handler entry

Parameters

  • nested (HandlerStore) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

add(entry)[source]#

Adds given handler entry into store. :param entry: handler entry to add into store

Parameters

entry (HandlerEntry) –

include(entries)[source]#

Adds all handler entries from given iterable into store. :param entries: handler entries iterator

Parameters

entries (Iterable[HandlerEntry]) –

classmethod wrap(nested, modifiers)[source]#

Wraps given handler store into modifier handler store if any modifiers provided or returns unchanged if there are no modifiers. :param nested: handler store to be nested into modifier handler store :param modifiers: sequence of modifiers to apply on every new store entry :return: handler store with entry modifier stack apply

Parameters

  • nested (HandlerStore) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

Return type

HandlerStore

class mediator.common.registry.HandlerRegistry[source]#

Bases: HandlerStore

Handler registry class.

Facade that joins modified handler store functionality with ability to add handlers directly created from raw objects.

__init__(store, policies=None, cascade=None, modifiers=())[source]#

Initializes handler registry. :param store: underlying handler store used for handler entry storage :param policies: (optional) sequence of policies to be used as recipe to convert raw objects into handlers; if not provided cascade argument should be set; is overwritten when cascade is provided :param cascade: (optional) custom handler factory cascade to customize policy into handler factory mapping; if not provided policies argument should be set :param modifiers: sequence of modifiers to be applied on new handler entries

Parameters

  • store (HandlerStore) –

  • policies (Optional[Sequence[Union[CallableHandlerPolicy, MethodHandlerPolicy, MappablePolicy]]]) –

  • cascade (Optional[HandlerFactoryCascade]) –

  • modifiers (Sequence[ModifierFactory]) –

add(entry)[source]#

Adds given handler entry into store. :param entry: handler entry to add into store

Parameters

entry (HandlerEntry) –

include(entries)[source]#

Adds all handler entries from given iterable into store. :param entries: handler entries iterator

Parameters

entries (Iterable[HandlerEntry]) –

register(obj=None, *, policies=None, modifiers=())[source]#

Registers given raw object as an action handler or provides decorator that registers given raw object as an action handler. :param obj: (optional) raw handler object (like function) :param policies: custom one time polices to be used in object inspection process :param modifiers: custom one time modifiers to be applied on given object handler :return: returns given raw object or decorator, when no object is provided

Parameters

Lookup handler store error.
